resources.string: Stack is a Data Sructure that follows LIFO (Last In First Out).stack is an abstract data type that serves as a collection of elements, with two principal operations: push, which adds an element to the collection, and pop, which removes the most recently added element that was not yet removed.

Queue is a data structur that supports FIFO (First In First Out). You can think of Queue as a real life queue at any waiting line. Where the person who comes first is served first and the person who is last is served last.
